product_name: The North Face NFZ Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: The women's NFZ insulated jacket by The North Face features Gore-Tex(R) waterproof protection and PrimaLoft(R) One insulation to keep you dry and cozy on the slopes, all winter long. Rugged 2-layer Gore-Tex laminate and seam sealed construction delivers waterproof protection and breathable comfort for dependable performance during your winter activities. Jacket features PrimaLoft One ultrafine microfiber insulation to offer warm, downlike performance and comfort in the cold; extra insulation is added in critical areas. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Powder skirt helps seal out cold air and snow entry; clip-in tabs let you connect the powder skirt to compatible pants (sold separately) for an integrated, protective barrier. Weather-resistant zippered chest pocket; dual-entry zip/flap-covered handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket (with goggles cloth); internal goggles pocket. Rip-and-stick tabs secure stormflap over center front zipper to help keep the cold from seeping in; adjustable hood is helmet-compatible and offers excellent peripheral vision. Pit-zip vents let you dump excess heat and provide cooling ventilation. The North Face NFZ insulated jacket has a drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuffs to seal out the elements and retain warmth; cuffs have thumb loops to help keep cuffs in place.
short_description: The women's NFZ insulated jacket by The North Face features Gore-Tex(R) waterproof protection and PrimaLoft(R) One insulation to keep you dry and cozy on the slopes, all winter long.
